name: incidenttrigger
label: New Incident
description: Trigger when a new incident is created
returnDescription: Available keys: triggerType, opened_at, number, description, sys_id

attributes.name: priority
attributes.label: Filter on Priority Level
attributes.description: An incident with priority level at or above input priority will initiate the trigger. i.e. If 5 is selected (lowest priority), all created incidents will initiate the trigger. Leaving this field blank will watch all incidents regardless of priority.

attributes.name: interval
attributes.label: Please provide the interval to trigger in seconds
attributes.description: Interval should not be less than 30 seconds.

name: watchIncident
label: Watch Incident
description: Trigger when a specified incident is updated
returnDescription: Available keys: triggerType, updated_at, updated_by, description

attributes.name: interval
attributes.label: Please provide the interval to trigger in seconds
attributes.description: Interval should not be less than 30 seconds.
